InstructionData.Title: SMAL-200
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# SMAL-100 # Smart Airlock # # Connect the airlock console, two active vents, # and two pipe sensors. # After you use the airlock the vents # are automatically depressurized. alias Console d0 alias IntVent d1 alias ExtVent d2 alias GasSensor d3 alias IntSensor d4 alias ExtSensor d5
define MAXPRESSURE 25000 define INTVENT 1 define EXTVENT 2 define INTSENSOR 4 define EXTSENSOR 5 define TIMEOUT 60
alias devVent r0 alias devSensor r1 alias setting r2 alias lastSetting r3 alias pressure r4 alias sp r5 alias ticks r6 alias temp r7 init: l setting Console Setting mul sp MAXPRESSURE 0.8
# wait for console setting to change reset: move ticks 0
idle: jal decide bge ticks TIMEOUT powersave add ticks ticks 1 yield j idle
extopen: move devVent EXTVENT move devSensor EXTSENSOR j checkpressure
intopen: move devVent INTVENT move devSensor INTSENSOR j checkpressure
checkpressure: l pressure dr1 Pressure ble pressure MAXPRESSURE reset venton: s dr0 Lock 0 s dr0 On 1 #s dr0 PressureExternal 150 s dr0 Mode 0 jal extpressure vent: yield l pressure dr1 Pressure s db Setting pressure move lastSetting setting l setting Console Setting bne setting lastSetting interrupt ble pressure sp ventoff jal extpressure j vent
ventoff: s dr0 On 0 j lockvent
interrupt: s dr0 Mode 1 j lockvent
lockvent: s dr0 Lock 1 j reset
powersave: s Console On 0 s IntSensor On 0 s ExtSensor On 0 standby: jal decide l temp Console On beq temp 1 reset yield
decide: move lastSetting setting l setting Console Setting s db Setting setting beq setting lastSetting ra beq setting 2 intopen beq setting 5 extopen move ticks 0 j ra
extpressure: l temp GasSensor Pressure add temp temp 1 s dr0 PressureExternal temp j ra
